response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, it is worth $1,200,000 to us. However, considering its immense potential impact on your endeavors, we are more than willing to offer it to you at a special price. We kindly propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who will appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest potential. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
